metadata.title: CVE-2018-6107 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect handling of confusable characters in URL Formatter in GoogleChrome prior to 66.0.3359.117 allowed a remote attacker to perform domainspoofing via IDN homographs via a crafted domain name.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
